msbt.message: I had a blast goin' toe-to-toe with you the other day! So glad to see there are still some folks around who'll mix it up a little bit. Anyway, here's that fruit prize I owe you. Let's have a rematch real soon!
We had some fun, didn't we? Don't even mind comin' out on the losin' side, as long as I have fun. Anyway, here's the fruit I owe you. Let's play again sometime soon, so I can try and win some back.

You seemed like you were havin' a blast when we played that game. 'Course, it's easy to have fun when you're winnin'. Gahaha! Don't mind me teasin' you... Here's that prize you won fair and square. Enjoy it!
